data.trans_hint: Anh ấy được nhận nuôi khi lên năm tuổi.
data.en_hint: He was adopted when he was five.
data.content_game_1: He was adopted when he was five.
data.answer_en_hint: He was adopted when he was five.

data.trans_hint: Thật là độc ác cho một đứa trẻ khi nhìn thấy gia đình của mình tan vỡ.
data.en_hint: It is cruel for a child to see his family break down.
data.content_game_1: It is cruel for a child to see his family break down.
data.answer_en_hint: It is cruel for a child to see his family break down.

data.trans_hint: Một vài trẻ phát triển chậm hơn nhiều so với các trẻ khác.
data.en_hint: Some children develop more slowly than others.
data.content_game_1: Some children develop more slowly than others.
data.answer_en_hint: Some children develop more slowly than others.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy đã phải chịu đựng nhiều cuộc phẫu thuật đau đớn từ khi còn là một đứa bé.
data.en_hint: She had to endure numerous painful operations when she was a child.
data.content_game_1: She had to endure numerous painful operations when she was a child.
data.answer_en_hint: She had to endure numerous painful operations when she was a child.

data.trans_hint: Người quản lý cố gắng thiết lập một mạng lưới giữa những nhân viên của mình để tăng năng suất làm việc.
data.en_hint: The manager tries to establish a good network amongst her employees to boost productivity.
data.content_game_1: The manager tries to establish a good network amongst her employees to boost productivity.
data.answer_en_hint: The manager tries to establish a good network amongst her employees to boost productivity.

data.trans_hint: Việc bắt đầu cuộc trò chuyện với ai đó sẽ dễ hơn nếu như bạn có điểm chung với họ.
data.en_hint: It is easier to start a conversation with someone whom you have something in common.
data.content_game_1: It is easier to start a conversation with someone whom you have something in common.
data.answer_en_hint: It is easier to start a conversation with someone whom you have something in common.

data.trans_hint: Anh ta thừa kế ngôi nhà sau khi người cha qua đời.
data.en_hint: He inherits the house after his father passed away.
data.content_game_1: He inherits the house after his father passed away.
data.answer_en_hint: He inherits the house after his father passed away.

data.trans_hint: Mặc dù mới đi làm ngày đầu tiên, cô ấy tương tác khá tốt với các đồng nghiệp của mình.
data.en_hint: Although it is her first day at work, she interacts well with her colleagues.
data.content_game_1: Although it is her first day at work, she interacts well with her colleagues.
data.answer_en_hint: Although it is her first day at work, she interacts well with her colleagues.

data.trans_hint: Thư viện nhỏ của mẹ tôi ở nhà đã nuôi dưỡng trong tôi tình yêu đối với sách.
data.en_hint: My mother's little library at home has nurtured in me a love for books.
data.content_game_1: My mother's little library at home has nurtured in me a love for books.
data.answer_en_hint: My mother's little library at home has nurtured in me a love for books.

data.trans_hint: Người cha đóng một vai trò cực kỳ quan trọng trong cuộc đời mỗi đứa trẻ mà không ai khác có thể lấp đầy.
data.en_hint: Fathers play a crucial role in every child's life that cannot be filled by others.
data.content_game_1: Fathers play a crucial role in every child's life that cannot be filled by others.
data.answer_en_hint: Fathers play a crucial role in every child's life that cannot be filled by others.

data.trans: Có quan hệ, gắn liền, liên quan
data.trans_hint: Khi nghĩ về gia đình, chúng ta luôn luôn gắn liền nó với sự hạnh phúc.
data.en_hint: Thinking of family, we always relate it to happiness.
data.content_game_1: Thinking of family, we always relate it to happiness.
data.answer_en_hint: Thinking of family, we always relate it to happiness.
